i1.blurb: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Both '''Lamb''' and '''Wolf''' mark targets to ''hunt''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} on a marked target permanently empowers '''Kindred's''' abilities, as well as granting '''Lamb''' {{pp|type=Marks|8|75|100|125|150|175|200|225|250|4|7|10|13|16|19|22|25|formula=+75 at 4 Marks, and +25 every 3 Marks thereafter, up to 250 bonus range at 25 Marks.}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks and abilities.

{{sbc|Lamb - Enemy Champions:}} '''Lamb''' is offered a selection of {{tip|champions}} to take down, which is hidden while {{tt|in combat with an enemy champion|6 seconds timer}}. Once selected, there's an 8 seconds delay before the ''Mark'' can be collected, and '''Lamb''' can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. ''Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for 4 minutes.''
i1.name: Mark of the Kindred
notes: * Gaining marks will increase the target acquisition range for {{ai|Dance of Arrows|Kindred}}.
i1.static: {{tt|40|Upon marked monster camp's death, even if Kindred are not involved}} / {{tt|75|Upon selecting/changing target}}

q1.blurb: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, gaining 25% {{as|(+ 5% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds while firing up to three arrows to nearby targets, dealing {{as|physical damage}}. '''Lamb's''' current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting {{ai|Wolf's Frenzy|Kindred}} or dashing while inside the area will reduce '''Dance of Arrows'''' {{sti|cooldown}}.
''Dance of Arrows'' resets '''Lamb's''' basic attack timer.
q1.name: Dance of Arrows

w1.blurb: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} As '''Kindred''' move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of ''Hunter's Vigor''. At full stacks, '''Lamb's''' next basic attack {{tip|heal|restores}} up to {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|32 to 100}} health}}|health}}, based on {{as|'''Kindred's''' '''missing''' health}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Wolf''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next {{fd|8.5}} seconds, separating from '''Lamb'''. '''Wolf''' [[Champion summoned units|autonomously]] attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing '''Lamb's''' attack target.

'''Wolf's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} and scale with {{as|25% of '''Kindred's bonus''' attack speed}}. Against [[monster]]s, '''Wolf''' deals 50% increased damage and his attacks {{tip|slow}} his target by 50% for 2 seconds.
''Wolf's Frenzy'' ends immediately if '''Lamb''' leaves the area.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
w1.name: Wolf's Frenzy
notes: * '''Wolf''' is untargetable, invulnerable and {{tip|ghosted}}, but cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation.
* '''Wolf''' is not able to re-target {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} if he loses sight of it while he's attacking it.

e1.blurb: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' cripples the target unit, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for 1 second.

If '''Lamb''' manages to attack the target twice with no longer than 4 seconds between each attack after casting '''Mounting Dread''', her third attack within the following 4 seconds directs '''Wolf''' to pounce the target, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against monster at 300 bonus damage.

'''Wolf's''' pounce will {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|150}}|physical damage}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} against targets below {{as|15% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 1% critical strike chance)}} of their '''maximum''' health}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
e1.name: Mounting Dread

r1.blurb: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds. While inside the area, '''all units''' {{tip|invulnerability|cannot}} be reduced below {{as|{{sti|health|10% their '''maximum''' health}}}}. Units in the area who reach the threshold cannot be healed for the remaining duration.
All units within the zone are {{tip|heal|healed}} immediately when the blessing ends.
r1.name: Lamb's Respite
notes: * Any given unit's {{sti|health regeneration}} will still be active while inside ''Lamb's Respite''.
